backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining access-controlled ledger data types, user profiles, balances, and charge creation logic with date-based entries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component handling authentication, profile setup, theme, and rendering the ledger page.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with branding and user menu supporting logout and profile identity display.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication guard that shows a login screen until the user is authenticated.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable empty-state component displaying an icon or illustration with text and optional action.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their name, with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/ResponsiveTableS: Wrapper providing horizontal scroll support for wide tables using ScrollArea.
frontend/src/features/ledger/CarExpenses: Displays car expenses for a date range, computes totals, and provides a dialog to add categorized car expenses.
frontend/src/features/ledger/CashPayment: Form dialog for recording a traveller’s cash payment with amount, date, and note validation.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DailyPartic: Grid UI to mark travellers’ AM/PM trips per day, manage weekend inclusion, and save daily participation data.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DateRangePi: Popover-based picker allowing users to set start and end dates for the ledger’s active date range.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteCarEx: Confirmation dialog for deleting a car expense with a success toast on completion.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteCashP: Confirmation dialog for deleting a cash payment tied to a traveller, with success feedback.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditCarExpe: Dialog for editing an existing car expense with validation and update callbacks.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditCashPay: Dialog for editing a cash payment with validation and update callbacks.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExpenseHist: Wrapper dialog that opens and displays the expense history view.
Displays filterable, searchable, and sortable car expense history with edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExportButto: Button that opens the export report dialog.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExportRepor: Dialog for exporting ledger data with format selection and section/traveller filters.
Main ledger page with tabs, date controls, summaries, expenses, and history dialogs.
frontend/src/features/ledger/LedgerState: Context provider exposing ledger state and mutation functions from local state hooks.
frontend/src/features/ledger/OtherPendin: Dialog form for adding other pending amounts for a traveller with validation.
frontend/src/features/ledger/OverallSumm: Computes total and month-wise income, expenses, and profit/loss for all travellers within a date range and renders an overall financial summary.
frontend/src/features/ledger/PaymentHist: Provides a dialog that displays the payment history view, triggered by a button.
Filters and displays cash payments in a sortable table with options to edit or delete entries.
frontend/src/features/ledger/RatePerTrip: Allows editing the per-trip rate with validation and syncs changes to ledger state.
frontend/src/features/ledger/SummaryPane: Calculates per-traveller trip counts, charges, payments, pending amounts, and balances for the selected date range and displays detailed summaries.
frontend/src/features/ledger/TravellerMa: Manages traveller records, allowing adding, renaming, and removing travellers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, handling login state and restoring identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useLedgerLocalState.t: Manages local ledger state with travellers, daily trip data, payments, expenses, and date range, persisting changes to localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps react-query hooks to fetch and update the caller’s user profile via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers and theme variables for light/dark modes with custom palette and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/dateRange.ts: Utility for generating date ranges and formatting dates for keys and display.
frontend/src/utils/exportExcel.ts: Builds CSV data for daily trip grids and summary calculations, then triggers file downloads.
frontend/src/utils/exportReport.ts: Exports filtered ledger data to CSV across multiple sections like grid, summary, payments, and expenses.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Formats numbers as INR currency and parses currency strings back to numbers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing), storing and retrieving them from sessionStorage, and syncing URL values to storage.
frontend/src/utils/weekendInclusion.ts: Defines functions to detect weekend days and determine whether dates are included or editable based on Saturday/Sunday inclusion flags.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project's state, including feature definitions, weekend inclusion requirements, tab UI goals, and report-generation plans.
